Sqaure One App


This is an app that I'm currently working on with the Square One Initiative, a student startup apart of Northwestern's Garage Startup program focused on providing healthcare resources for elementary school students. This purpose of this app is to put all of these resources into one place for these students, from health comics to personal sleep goals.


I'm currently an engineer on the app team and I've had the best time developing this app, and it's currently still in the works! Althought I can't show the final product, here's a map of some elements of the app that we're currently implementing/improving.

Home

Activity Hub

Library

Personal Achievements

Sleep Log

Mental Health Comic

Sleep Achievement
